H0.text: who were the original voices of the flintstones. Daws Butler

H1.text: who were the original voices of the flintstones. Don Messick

H2.text: who were the original voices of the flintstones. June Foray

H3.text: who were the original voices of the flintstones. Mel Blanc

A4.text: Mel Blanc voiced Betty's husband, Barney Rubble.

A5.text: June Foray auditioned for the part of Betty Rubble on The Flintstones.

A6.text: Daws Butler provided the voice of Barney for a few episodes.
